Lungile Khumalo nke a maara nke ọma dịka Naima Kay, bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu Afro-Jazz.
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ma na-ede abụ na ukwe n' ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, ọ rụkwara na jazz Festival ebe ọ malitere ịdọta uche.
Nweputa nke egwu Umsebenzi n'afọ 2013 nwere ọtụtụ mmetụta na ndụ ndị South Africa
Abọm ahụ rere nke ọma ma nweta ihe nrite, South African Music Award (SAMA) n'afọ 2014 maka Best Newcomer
onye isi Touch Africa Records bu Mdu Ngcobo chọpụtara nka Kay,bụ onye nyere ya aha Arabic bụ Naima Kay na-nke nkọwa ya Udo na Obi iru ala.
Ya na Robbie Malinga na Scelo Gowane rụkọrọ ọrụ.
Kay ejidela mpụtara Siri ike, na-akwudosike ime  ihe ngosi redio na ngosipụta ihe n' isi ihe omume mba na Ememe dị ka ememe UGu Jazz Festival na Durban Jazz festival.
N'afọ 2014, Naima Kay ritere ihe nrite "Best Newcomer" na South African Music Awards na abọm mbụ ya bụ "Umsebenzi".
